onClick.url: function(track,f) {var wburl = 'http://staging.wormbase.org'; var name = f.get('Name'); return wburl+'/species/all/pcr_oligo/'+name;  }
onClick.label: Feature in WormBase Staging
onClick.title: Feature in WormBase Staging

metadata.citation: This track indicates the location of primer pairs that have been created by a number of groups.  Click on the element to obtain the left and right oligo sequences, information about the amplification information, and ordering information (if available).
